original_text: I tell you this. He will show that they are right. He will help them quickly. I, the Son of Man, will return to earth. But will I find many people that still believe in me then, or not?’
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 이르노니 속히 그 원한을 풀어 주시리라 그러나 인자가 올 때에 세상에서 믿음을 보겠느냐 하시니라

sentences.original_text: He will show that they are right.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들이 옳다는 것을 보여줄 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I, the Son of Man, will return to earth.
But will I find many people that still believe in me then,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그때 내가 나를 여전히 믿는 많은 사람들을 찾을까,
